definitions.definition: Those qualities or features that are imperfect; the characteristic, state, or quality of being imperfect .
examples: You can accept your imperfection or try to improve.

definitions.definition: Something that makes something else less than perfect; a blemish , impurity , error , etc.
examples: He loves me despite my imperfections .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Those qualities or features that are imperfect; the characteristic, state, or quality of being imperfect .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Something that makes something else less than perfect; a blemish , impurity , error , etc.
